summary: In August 2022, the Department of Defense issued a plan to improve how it protects civilians from harm during U.S. military operations. DOD has worked to address the plan's 11 objectives, initially focusing on the 5 deemed most critical. title: Civilian Harm: DOD Should Take Actions to Enhance Its Plan for Mitigation and Response Efforts
